#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

struct Point{float x,y;};

int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    cout.precision(1);
    cout.setf(ios::fixed, ios::floatfield );

    int t, n;
    float result;
    Point pts [20];

    cin >> t;
    while (t--)
    {
        result = 0;
        cin >> n;

        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
            cin >> pts[i].x;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
            cin >> pts[i].y;

        for (int i = 0; i < n-1; ++i)
            result += (pts[i].y+pts[i+1].y)*(pts[i].x-pts[i+1].x)/2;
        result += (pts[n-1].y+pts[0].y)*(pts[n-1].x-pts[0].x)/2;

        cout << abs(result) << "\n";
    }
}
